extendedInfo.description: This application contains 210 folk and fairy tales by the Brothers Grimm.Children's and Household Tales (German: Kinder- und HausmÃ¤rchen) is a collection of German origin fairy tales first published in 1812 by Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm, the Brothers Grimm. The collection is commonly known today as Grimms' Fairy Tales (German: Grimms MÃ¤rchen).Example Tales1  The Frog King, or Iron Henry 2  Cat and Mouse in Partnership 3  Our Lady's Child 4  The Story of the Youth Who Went Forth to Learn What Fear Was 5  The Wolf and the Seven Young Kids 6  Faithful John7  The Good Bargain8  The Strange Musician9  The Twelve Brothers10  The Pack of RagamuffinsChildren's LegendsLegend 1  St. Joseph in the Forest Legend 2  The Twelve Apostles Legend 3  The Rose Legend 4  Poverty and Humility Lead to Heaven Legend 5  God's Food Legend 6  The Three Green Twigs Legend 7  Our Lady's Little Glass Legend 8  The Aged Mother Legend 9  The Heavenly WeddingLegend 10  The Hazel Branch***Important***In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen,Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage.This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.

reviews.title: Nice list.of stories... bad user experience
reviews.comment: Does not keep place when you rotate your phone.  Pretty annoying...  some of these stories are pretty long...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: Removed immediately and never even opened it because it automatically installed a shortcut onto my homescreen of some random thing. Seems malicious or something.  Would not suggest downloading there are so many other free grimm apps not worth the risk.
reviews.author: A Google User
